name: passion ktv
description:
There are four masked Bunnies in this passion KTV. They'll want you to launch all kinds of obstacles. What you need to do is shoot at them and flexibly switch three types of bullets to destroy obstacles.
Bullet part
Flame bomb - it is a basic bullet with medium firing speed and can destroy an obstacle.
Bubble - slow fire speed, can effectively defend against obstacles.
Flame Wave - very fast. The faster the speed, the greater the kinetic energy, so the flame wave can destroy two obstacles. porn [/]It is mainly divided into three categories: animation plot, interactive mode and film mode. Among them, the animation plot needs to break through the customs to unlock. There are four parts in total.The interactive mode can control the climax of the protagonist in CG at will. ୧( ⁼ ̴̶̤̀ω ⁼ ̴̶̤́ ) ૭The power mode is simple and rough. You can watch it without any operation! Suitable for freeing hands.
